# react-native-video

> A <Video /> element for React Native - the most battle-tested video player component with support for DRM, offline playback, HLS/DASH streaming, and more.

## Project Overview
[![React Native Video Component](./docs/assets/baners/rnv-banner.png)](https://thewidlarzgroup.com/?utm_source=rnv&utm_medium=readme&utm_id=banner)

The most battle-tested open-source video player component for React Native with support for DRM, offline playback, HLS/DASH streaming, and more.


## üîç Features

- üì± Plays all video formats natively supported by iOS/Android 
- ‚ñ∂Ô∏è Local and remote playback  
- üîÅ Streaming: HLS ‚Ä¢ DASH ‚Ä¢ SmoothStreaming  
- üîê DRM: Widevine & FairPlay ([See free DRM stream example](https://www.thewidlarzgroup.com/services/free-drm-token-generator-for-video?utm_source=rnv&utm_medium=readme&utm_id=free-drm))
- üì¥ Offline playback, video download, support for side-tracks and side-captions (via [optional SDK](https://docs.thewidlarzgroup.com/offline-video-sdk?utm_source=rnv&utm_medium=readme&utm_id=features-text))  
- üéöÔ∏è Fine-grained control over tracks, buffering & events
- üß© Expo plugin support
- üåê Basic Web Support 
- üì± Picture in Picture
- üì∫ TV Support



## ‚ú® Project Status

| Version | State | Architecture |
|---------|-------|--------------|
| **v5 and lower** | ‚ùå End-of-life [Commercial Support Available](https://www.thewidlarzgroup.com/blog/react-native-video-upgrade-challenges-custom-maintenance-support#how-we-can-help?utm_source=rnv&utm_medium=readme&utm_id=upgradev5) | Old Architecture |
| **v6** | üõ† Maintained (community + TWG) | Old + New (Interop Layer) |
| [**v7**](https://github.com/TheWidlarzGroup/react-native-video/tree/v7) | [üöÄ Active Development](https://github.com/TheWidlarzGroup/react-native-video/tree/v7) | Old + New (Full Support) |

[`react-native-video` v7](https://github.com/TheWidlarzGroup/react-native-video/tree/v7) introduces full support for the new React Native architecture, unlocking better performance, improved consistency, and modern native modules.


## Key Concepts & Terminology
- **Video**: Main React component for rendering video content
- **VideoRef**: Imperative API for controlling playback via refs
- **Source**: Video source configuration (local files, URLs, streams)
- **DRM**: Built-in support for Widevine & FairPlay DRM
- **Tracks**: Audio, video, and text track selection and management
- **Events**: Comprehensive event system for playback state, progress, errors, etc.

## Usage Examples
1. Basic playback

   ```tsx
   import Video, { VideoRef } from 'react-native-video';
   import { useRef } from 'react';
   
   export default function Example() {
     const videoRef = useRef<VideoRef>(null);
     
     return (
       <Video
         source={{ uri: 'https://example.com/video.mp4' }}
         ref={videoRef}
         style={{ width: '100%', aspectRatio: 16 / 9 }}
         controls
       />
     );
   }
   ```

2. Advanced control (seek & pause)

   ```tsx
   // Using ref to control playback
   videoRef.current?.setNativeProps({ paused: true });
   videoRef.current?.seek(10); // seconds
   ```

## Version
Package version: 6.16.1
